casebody.data:
No. 10-6216. Euladio Santiago, Jr., Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 978, 131 S. Ct. 484,

178 L. Ed. 2d 315,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7868. October 12, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of *316Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 601 F.3d 1241.
